attributes.action: After 12 weeks of claiming Job Seekers Allowance - All claimaints should be made to do voluantry work within their local community.
attributes.additional_details:
Too many people are now being allowed to claim JSA.

Why should the hard working tax payer support people who can't be bothered to work?

I would like to suggest that any JSA claimaint who has claimed for more that 12 weeks and is still un-employed should be made to do at least 3 hours voluntary work per day within the local community.

By doing this the JSA Claimant would be giving a little something back to the community that works hard to support them.
